title: Mike Macdonald says emphasizing the fundamentals of tackling is key to Seahawks' success

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Mike Macdonald says emphasizing the fundamentals of tackling is key to Seahawks' success
sources.description: Seahawks coach Mike Macdonald says his team's success on defense stems from hard work at the most fundamental part of playing defense: Making tackles.
